description: Blocks 2 enemies
Obtain 1 DP after this unit defeats an enemy; Refunds the original DP Cost when retreated
This unit can designate one Tactical Point within attack range to call Reinforcements; ATK is increased to 150% when attacking enemies blocked by Reinforcements
Cannot block enemies during the skill duration
Attacks all blocked enemies
Blocks 1 enemy
Deals Arts damage
Can attack enemies from range; When attacking enemies not blocked by self, increase ATK to 120%
Can launch Ranged Attacks that deal 80% of normal ATK
Normal attacks deal damage twice
Can't be healed by other units. Recovers 70 self HP every time this operator attacks an enemy
Blocks 1 enemy and ignores the Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time

Cannot be healed by allies
Attack all enemies within range
Recovers 50 HP with every enemy hit (up to Block count)

Does not attack and have 0 block count normally
Gradually increase attack power up to +200% after 40 seconds when skill is not active
Attack increase resets after skill ends

Can heal allies by using the skill
Cannot be healed by allies
Normal attacks deal Arts damage while the skill is active
Only restores SP when blocking enemies
Attacks aerial enemies first
High accuracy point-blank shot
Deals AOE Physical damage
Prioritizes attacking the enemy with lowest DEF within range first
Attacks all enemies within range, and deals 150% damage to enemies in the row directly in front of this unit.
Attacks the heaviest enemy first
Attacks deal two instances of Physical damage to ground enemies in a small area (The second instance is a shockwave that has half the normal ATK)
Deals Arts damage
Deals AOE Arts damage
Controls a Drone to deal Arts damage to an enemy; When the Drone continuously attacks the same enemy, its damage will increase (up to 110% of the operator's ATK)
Normally does not attack, but has greatly increased DEF and RES; When skill is active, attacks deal AoE Arts damage
Attacks deal Arts damage; When unable to find a target, attacks can be stored up and fired all at once (Up to 3 charges)
Attacks deal Arts damage and jump between 3 enemies. Each jump deals 20% less damage and inflicts a brief Slow
Deals AOE Arts damage in a long line
Restores the HP of allies and ignores the Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time
Restores the HP of 3 allies simultaneously
Has a large healing range, but the healing amount on farther targets is reduced to 70%
Deals Arts damage and Slows the target for a short time
Deals Arts damage
Does not attack but continuously restores the HP of all allies within range (the HP restored per second is equal to 10% of self ATK). Self is unaffected by Inspiration

Can be deployed on Ranged Grids
Continually loses HP over time
Has reduced Redeployment Time, but DP Cost is not refunded upon retreating; While deployed, 3 DP are consumed every 3 seconds (automatically retreats without sufficient DP)
Can use traps to assist in combat, but traps cannot be placed on tiles already occupied by an enemy

Heal friendly unit
